text: “magē deviyanē! niyata vaśayenma mema piḷirū minisungen bohomayak denāva durmārgayehi yāmaṭa sælæssuvēya. ebævin (piḷirū nonæmada) kavurun māva anugamanaya karannēda, ohuma niyata vaśayenma magen keneku vannēya. kavurun maṭa venaskam karannēda, (ohu magē pārśavayē keneku novūvada, magē deviyanē!) niyata vaśayenma oba itāmat kṣamā karanneku vana atara karuṇāvantayeku vaśayenda siṭinnehiya
